mapper.select: select achievement_id, name, content, photo, acquisition_condition location from achievement order by achievement_id asc

select ua.achievement_id, ac.name, ac.content, ac.photo, ac.acquisition_condition, ac.location, ua.progress, ua.get_date from user_achievement ua left join achievement ac on ua.achievement_id = ac.achievement_id where user_id = #{no};
mapper.insert: insert into achievement(achievement_id, name, content, photo, acquisition_condition, location) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{content}, #{photo}, #{condition}, #{location})
mapper.select: select achievement_id name, content, photo, acquisition_condition, location from achievement where achievement_id=#{id}
mapper.update: update achievement set name=#{name}, content=#{content}, photo=#{photo}, acquisition_condition=#{condition}, location=#{location} where achievement_id=#{id}
